name: Time Traveler Day
description:
Traveling through time has never been a pleasant activity. 

But if you are followed by the time mafia, then it becomes dangerous!
Today, or tomorrow, however, I lost and they managed to catch me. 
Since simply deleting me from time is not so easy then they trapped me in a time loop.
I have an hour ... every day the one last hour I can live in this dimension and will abandon me again after this hour, 
But they have probably forgotten that the world I have changed before will remain changes.
And I hope that one of these hours will really last.
